contacts_permission_message:
‚ÄúWHOS‚ÄôIN‚Äù Would Like to Access Your Contacts

To help you discover and connect with friends who are already using the app, we request access to your device‚Äôs contact list.

What We Collect:
If you allow access, your contact list (names, phone numbers, and email addresses) will be collected and uploaded to our secure servers.

Why We Collect It:
We use this information to identify which of your contacts are already registered on our platform, so we can show you mutual connections and enhance your social experience.

How It‚Äôs Used:

Only contacts already using the app will be shown to you.

Contacts not on our platform will not be stored or retained.

We do not share your contacts with any third parties.

We do not use this data for advertising or marketing purposes.

Your Privacy:
You can revoke contact access at any time from your device settings. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

By tapping "Allow Access", you consent to the collection, uploading, and use of your contact list as described above.
